sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE169010A WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.SETT_GBNM , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SUBT_ETAX , AA.SUBT_INHB , AA.SUBT_FAFV , AA.SUBT_AMSU
FROM ( SELECT (1) AS SOT , ('결정세액') AS SETT_GBNM , SYSTEMKEY , CLUT_SEPT_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , DPOB_CD , NVL(YETA_STD_C159,0) AS SUBT_ETAX , NVL(YETA_STD_C160,0) AS SUBT_INHB , NVL(YETA_STD_C161,0) AS SUBT_FAFV , ( NVL(YETA_STD_C159 ,0) + NVL(YETA_STD_C160 ,0) + NVL(YETA_STD_C161 ,0) ) AS SUBT_AMSU
FROM YE169010A
UNION ALL SELECT (2) AS SOT , ('기납부세액') AS SETT_GBNM , TA01.SYSTEMKEY , TA01.CLUT_SEPT_CD , TA01.YRTX_BLGG_YR , TA01.DPOB_CD , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C162 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) ) AS ALDC_PIIT , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C163 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) ) AS ALDC_PHBT , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C164 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM ,0) ) AS ALFA_YVTA , ((NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C162 ,0) + NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C163 ,0) + NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C164 ,0)) + (NVL(TA02.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM ,0)) ) AS ALDC_PHTO
FROM YE169010A TA01, ( SELECT EE.DPOB_CD, EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR, EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD, EE.SYSTEMKEY, SUM (EE.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM) AS PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM, SUM (EE.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM) AS PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM, SUM (EE.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM) AS PRCSP_NNKS_SUM FROM YE160404 EE WHERE EE.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND EE.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# GROUP BY EE.SYSTEMKEY, EE.DPOB_CD, EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR, EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD)TA02 WHERE TA01.DPOB_CD = TA02.DPOB_CD(+) AND TA01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = TA02.YRTX_BLGG_YR(+) AND TA01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = TA02.CLUT_SEPT_CD(+) AND TA01.SYSTEMKEY = TA02.SYSTEMKEY(+)
UNION ALL SELECT (3) AS SOT , ('차감징수세액') AS SETT_GBNM , SYSTEMKEY , CLUT_SEPT_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , DPOB_CD , NVL(YETA_STD_C168,0) AS SUBT_ETAX , NVL(YETA_STD_C169,0) AS SUBT_INHB , NVL(YETA_STD_C170,0) AS SUBT_FAFV , ( NVL(YETA_STD_C168 ,0) + NVL(YETA_STD_C169 ,0) + NVL(YETA_STD_C170 ,0) ) AS SUBT_AMSU
FROM YE169010A
) AA
WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY AA.SOT ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.SETT_GBNM , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SUBT_ETAX , AA.SUBT_INHB , AA.SUBT_FAFV , AA.SUBT_AMSU
FROM ( SELECT (1) AS SOT , ('결정세액') AS SETT_GBNM , SYSTEMKEY , CLUT_SEPT_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , DPOB_CD , NVL(YETA_STD_C159,0) AS SUBT_ETAX , NVL(YETA_STD_C160,0) AS SUBT_INHB , NVL(YETA_STD_C161,0) AS SUBT_FAFV , ( NVL(YETA_STD_C159 ,0) + NVL(YETA_STD_C160 ,0) + NVL(YETA_STD_C161 ,0) ) AS SUBT_AMSU
FROM YE169010A
UNION ALL SELECT (2) AS SOT , ('기납부세액') AS SETT_GBNM , TA01.SYSTEMKEY , TA01.CLUT_SEPT_CD , TA01.YRTX_BLGG_YR , TA01.DPOB_CD , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C162 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) ) AS ALDC_PIIT , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C163 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) ) AS ALDC_PHBT , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C164 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM ,0) ) AS ALFA_YVTA , ((NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C162 ,0) + NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C163 ,0) + NVL(TA01.YETA_STD_C164 ,0)) + (NVL(TA02.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM ,0)) ) AS ALDC_PHTO
FROM YE169010A TA01, ( SELECT EE.DPOB_CD, EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR, EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD, EE.SYSTEMKEY, SUM (EE.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM) AS PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM, SUM (EE.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM) AS PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM, SUM (EE.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM) AS PRCSP_NNKS_SUM FROM YE160404 EE WHERE EE.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND EE.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# GROUP BY EE.SYSTEMKEY, EE.DPOB_CD, EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR, EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD) TA02 WHERE TA01.DPOB_CD = TA02.DPOB_CD(+) AND TA01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = TA02.YRTX_BLGG_YR(+) AND TA01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = TA02.CLUT_SEPT_CD(+) AND TA01.SYSTEMKEY = TA02.SYSTEMKEY(+)
UNION ALL SELECT (3) AS SOT , ('차감징수세액') AS SETT_GBNM , SYSTEMKEY , CLUT_SEPT_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , DPOB_CD , NVL(YETA_STD_C168,0) AS SUBT_ETAX , NVL(YETA_STD_C169,0) AS SUBT_INHB , NVL(YETA_STD_C170,0) AS SUBT_FAFV , ( NVL(YETA_STD_C168 ,0) + NVL(YETA_STD_C169 ,0) + NVL(YETA_STD_C170 ,0) ) AS SUBT_AMSU
FROM YE169010A
) AA
WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )

sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE169010A WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YETA_STD_0C63 , YETA_STD_0C64 , YETA_STD_0C65 , YETA_STD_0C66 , YETA_STD_0C67 , YETA_STD_0C68 , YETA_STD_0C69 , YETA_STD_0C70 , YETA_STD_0C71 , YETA_STD_0C72 , YETA_STD_0C73 , YETA_STD_0C74 , YETA_STD_0C75 , YETA_STD_0C76 , YETA_STD_0C77 , YETA_STD_0C78 , YETA_STD_0C79 , YETA_STD_0C80 , YETA_STD_0C81 , YETA_STD_0C82 , YETA_STD_0C83 , YETA_STD_0C84 , YETA_STD_0C85 , YETA_STD_0C86 , YETA_STD_0C87 , YETA_STD_0C88 , YETA_STD_0C89 , YETA_STD_0C90 , YETA_STD_0C91 , YETA_STD_0C92 , YETA_STD_0C93 , YETA_STD_0C94 , YETA_STD_0C96 , YETA_STD_0C97 , YETA_STD_0C98 , YETA_STD_0C99 , YETA_STD_C100 , YETA_STD_C101 , YETA_STD_C102 , YETA_STD_C103 , YETA_STD_C104 , YETA_STD_C105 , YETA_STD_C107 , YETA_STD_C108 , YETA_STD_C109 , YETA_STD_C110 , YETA_STD_C111 , YETA_STD_C112 , YETA_STD_C113 , YETA_STD_C114 , YETA_STD_C115 , YETA_STD_C116 , YETA_STD_C117 , YETA_STD_C119 , YETA_STD_C120 , YETA_STD_C121 , YETA_STD_C122 , YETA_STD_C123 , YETA_STD_C124 , YETA_STD_C125 , YETA_STD_C126 , YETA_STD_C127 , YETA_STD_C128 , YETA_STD_C129 , YETA_STD_C130 , YETA_STD_C131 , YETA_STD_C132 , YETA_STD_C133 , YETA_STD_C134 , YETA_STD_C135 , YETA_STD_C136 , YETA_STD_C137 , YETA_STD_C138 , YETA_STD_C139 , YETA_STD_C140 , YETA_STD_C141 , YETA_STD_C142 , YETA_STD_C143 , YETA_STD_C144 , YETA_STD_C145 , YETA_STD_C146 , YETA_STD_C147 , YETA_STD_C148 , YETA_STD_C149 , YETA_STD_C150 , YETA_STD_C150A , YETA_STD_C150B , YETA_STD_C151 , YETA_STD_C152 , YETA_STD_C153 , YETA_STD_C154 , YETA_STD_C155 , YETA_STD_C156 , YETA_STD_C157 , YETA_STD_C158 , YETA_STD_C159 , YETA_STD_C160 , YETA_STD_C161 , YETA_STD_C162 , YETA_STD_C163 , YETA_STD_C164 , YETA_STD_C165 , YETA_STD_C166 , YETA_STD_C167 , YETA_STD_C168 , YETA_STD_C169 , YETA_STD_C170 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE169010A WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YETA_STD_0C63 , YETA_STD_0C64 , YETA_STD_0C65 , YETA_STD_0C66 , YETA_STD_0C67 , YETA_STD_0C68 , YETA_STD_0C69 , YETA_STD_0C70 , YETA_STD_0C71 , YETA_STD_0C72 , YETA_STD_0C73 , YETA_STD_0C74 , YETA_STD_0C75 , YETA_STD_0C76 , YETA_STD_0C77 , YETA_STD_0C78 , YETA_STD_0C79 , YETA_STD_0C80 , YETA_STD_0C81 , YETA_STD_0C82 , YETA_STD_0C83 , YETA_STD_0C84 , YETA_STD_0C85 , YETA_STD_0C86 , YETA_STD_0C87 , YETA_STD_0C88 , YETA_STD_0C89 , YETA_STD_0C90 , YETA_STD_0C91 , YETA_STD_0C92 , YETA_STD_0C93 , YETA_STD_0C94 , YETA_STD_0C96 , YETA_STD_0C97 , YETA_STD_0C98 , YETA_STD_0C99 , YETA_STD_C100 , YETA_STD_C101 , YETA_STD_C102 , YETA_STD_C103 , YETA_STD_C104 , YETA_STD_C105 , YETA_STD_C107 , YETA_STD_C108 , YETA_STD_C109 , YETA_STD_C110 , YETA_STD_C111 , YETA_STD_C112 , YETA_STD_C113 , YETA_STD_C114 , YETA_STD_C115 , YETA_STD_C116 , YETA_STD_C117 , YETA_STD_C119 , YETA_STD_C120 , YETA_STD_C121 , YETA_STD_C122 , YETA_STD_C123 , YETA_STD_C124 , YETA_STD_C125 , YETA_STD_C126 , YETA_STD_C127 , YETA_STD_C128 , YETA_STD_C129 , YETA_STD_C130 , YETA_STD_C131 , YETA_STD_C132 , YETA_STD_C133 , YETA_STD_C134 , YETA_STD_C135 , YETA_STD_C136 , YETA_STD_C137 , YETA_STD_C138 , YETA_STD_C139 , YETA_STD_C140 , YETA_STD_C141 , YETA_STD_C142 , YETA_STD_C143 , YETA_STD_C144 , YETA_STD_C145 , YETA_STD_C146 , YETA_STD_C147 , YETA_STD_C148 , YETA_STD_C149 , YETA_STD_C150 , YETA_STD_C150A , YETA_STD_C150B , YETA_STD_C151 , YETA_STD_C152 , YETA_STD_C153 , YETA_STD_C154 , YETA_STD_C155 , YETA_STD_C156 , YETA_STD_C157 , YETA_STD_C158 , YETA_STD_C159 , YETA_STD_C160 , YETA_STD_C161 , YETA_STD_C162 , YETA_STD_C163 , YETA_STD_C164 , YETA_STD_C165 , YETA_STD_C166 , YETA_STD_C167 , YETA_STD_C168 , YETA_STD_C169 , YETA_STD_C170 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE169010A WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE169010A WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C66, AC03.YETA_0C66) AS YETA_0C66 /* C66_기본공제_본인공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C67, AC03.YETA_0C67)AS YETA_0C67 /* C67_기본공제_배우자공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#,'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C69, AC03.YETA_0C69)AS YETA_0C69 /* C69_기본공제_부양공제금액 */
, ( TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C66, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C67, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C69, '0'))) AS YETA_SUM1
, DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C71,AC03.YETA_0C71)AS YETA_0C71 /* C71_추가공제_경로우대공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C73, AC03.YETA_0C73) AS YETA_0C73 /* C73_추가공제_장애인공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C74, AC03.YETA_0C74)AS YETA_0C74 /* C74_추가공제_부녀자공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#,'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C75, AC03.YETA_0C75) AS YETA_0C75 /* C75_추가공제_한부모가족공제금액 */
, ( TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C71, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C73, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C74, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C75, '0'))) AS YETA_SUM2
, DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C76, AC03.YETA_0C76)AS YETA_0C76 /* C76_연금보험료_국민연금보험료공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C77,AC03.YETA_0C77) AS YETA_0C77 /* C77_연금보험료_공적연금보험료공제_공무원연금 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C78,AC03.YETA_0C78)AS YETA_0C78 /* C78_연금보험료_공적연금보험료공제_군인연금 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C79,AC03.YETA_0C79)AS YETA_0C79 /* C79_연금보험료_공적연금보험료공제_사립학교교직원연금 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_0C80, AC03.YETA_0C80)AS YETA_0C80 /* C80_연금보험료_공적연금보험료공제_별정우체국연금 */
, ( TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C76, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C77, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C78, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C79, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_0C80, '0'))) AS YETA_SUM3
, DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_0C96 , AC03.YETA_0C96)AS YETA_SUM4 /* C96_특별소득공제_특별소득공제합계 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_0C97 , AC03.YETA_0C97) AS YETA_SUM5 /* C97_차감소득금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C110 , AC03.YETA_C110) AS YETA_SUM6 /* C110_기타소득공제합계금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C111 , AC03.YETA_C111)AS YETA_SUM7 /* C111_소득공제종합한도초과금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C112 , AC03.YETA_C112)AS YETA_SUM8 /* C112_종합소득과세표준금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C113 , AC03.YETA_C113) AS YETA_SUM9 /* C113_산출세액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C119 , AC03.YETA_C119)AS YETA_SUM10 /* C119_세액감면합계금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C120 , AC03.YETA_C120) AS YETA_SUM11 /* C120_세액공제_근로소득세액공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C122 , AC03.YETA_C122)AS YETA_C122 /* C122_세액공제_자녀세액공제금액*/ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C124 , AC03.YETA_C124) AS YETA_C124 /* C124_세액공제_6세이하자녀세액공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C126 , AC03.YETA_C126)AS YETA_C126 /* C126_세액공제_출산입양세액공제금액 */
, ( TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C122, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C124, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C126, '0'))) AS YETA_SUM12
, DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C128 , AC03.YETA_C128)AS YETA_C128 /* C128_세액공제_연금계좌_과학기술인공제세액공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C130 , AC03.YETA_C130)AS YETA_C130 /* C130_세액공제_연금계좌_퇴직급여세액공제금액*/ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# ,'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C132 , AC03.YETA_C132)AS YETA_C132 /* C132_세액공제_연금계좌_연금저축세액공제금액 */
, ( TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C128, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C130, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C132, '0')))AS YETA_SUM13
, DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# , 'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C134, AC03.YETA_C134) AS YETA_C134 /* C134_세액공제_특별세액공제_보장성보럼세액공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn# , 'Y' , AC04.YETA_STD_C136, AC03.YETA_C136) AS YETA_C136 /* C136_세액공제_특별세액공제_장애인전용세액공제금액 */
, (TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C134, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C136, '0'))) AS YETA_SUM14
, DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C138,AC03.YETA_C138) AS YETA_C138 /* C138_세액공제_특별세액공제_의료비세액공제금액 */
, (TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C138, '0'))) AS YETA_SUM15
, DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C140, AC03.YETA_C140)AS YETA_C140 /* C140_세액공제_특별세액공제_교육비세액공제금액 */
, (TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C140, '0'))) AS YETA_SUM16
, DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C142, AC03.YETA_C142)AS YETA_C142 /* C142_세액공제_특별세액공제_기부금정치자금10만이하세액공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#,'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C144,AC03.YETA_C144)AS YETA_C144 /* C144_세액공제_특별세액공제_기부금정치자금10만초과세액공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#,'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C146, AC03.YETA_C146)AS YETA_C146 /* C146_세액공제특별세액공제_법정기부금세액공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C148, AC03.YETA_C148) AS YETA_C148 /* C148_세액공제_특별세액공제_우리사주조합기부금세액공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C150,AC03.YETA_C150) AS YETA_C150 /* C150_세액공제_특별세액공제_지정기부금_종교단체외세액공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C150B,AC03.YETA_C150B)AS YETA_C150B /* C150B_세액공제_특별세액공제_지정기부금_종교단체세액공제금액 */
, ( TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C142, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C144, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C146, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C148, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C150, '0')) + TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C150B, '0')))AS YETA_SUM17
, DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C151 ,AC03.YETA_C151)AS YETA_SUM18 /* C151_세액공제_특별세액공제합계금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C152 ,AC03.YETA_C152)AS YETA_SUM19 /* C152_세액공제_표준세액공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C153 ,AC03.YETA_C153)AS YETA_SUM20 /* C153_세액공제_납세조합공제금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C154 ,AC03.YETA_C154) AS YETA_SUM21 /* C154_세액공제_주택차입금금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C155 ,AC03.YETA_C155) AS YETA_SUM22 /* C155_세액공제_외국납부금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C157 ,AC03.YETA_C157) AS YETA_C157 /* C157_세액공제_월세세액공제금액 */
, (TO_NUMBER (NVL (YETA_C157, '0'))) AS YETA_SUM23
, DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C158 ,AC03.YETA_C158)AS YETA_SUM24 /* C158_세액공제합계금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C159 ,AC03.YETA_C159) AS YETA_SUM25 /* C159_결정세액_소득세금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C160 ,AC03.YETA_C160)AS YETA_SUM26 /* C160_결정세액_지방소득세금액 */ , DECODE (#c152StdTxDdcYn#, 'Y', AC04.YETA_STD_C161 ,AC03.YETA_C161)AS YETA_SUM27 /* C161_결정세액_농특세금액 */
FROM YE161010 AC01, YE161020 AC02, YE169010 AC03, YE169010A AC04 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD =#dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AC02.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AC02.SYSTEMKEY
AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY
AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AC04.DPOB_CD(+) AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC04.YRTX_BLGG_YR(+) AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC04.CLUT_SEPT_CD(+) AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AC04.SYSTEMKEY(+)
